com.io7m.r2.meshes

Interface R2MeshTangentsBuilderType


  • public interface R2MeshTangentsBuilderType
    The type of mutable builders for meshes that have tangent vectors.

      • addVertex

        long addVertex(long p,
               long n,
               long t,
               long b,
               long u)
        throws NoSuchElementException
        Add a vertex.
        Parameters:
        p - The index of the position vector
        n - The index of the normal vector
        t - The index of the tangent vector
        b - The index of the bitangent vector
        u - The index of the UV vector
        Returns:
        The index of the new vertex
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - Iff any of the given indices do not exist
        See Also:
